DOC.brief_summary: Investigation of wholebody MRI and circulating biomarkers of inflammation, cartilage and bone metabolism in patients with spondyloarthritis treated with adalimumab. Furthermore to compare ultrasound examination with wholebody MRI etc.
DOC.brief_title: Adalimumab in Axial Spondyloarthritis (ASIM) - MRI and Biomarkers in Patients With Spondyloarthritis
